name: Vagrant King
description:
This is a very rough game, please bear with it.

Click and Drag to move pieces

Right Click to Possess / UnPossess a piece, note this does take a turn

My Submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam is Vagrant King. A rougelike where you play as a chess king with the ability to join pieces to your side. However when any piece that's on your side gets captured, you lose. This is how the game fits the theme "Joined Together". I hope you get some enjoyment from playing it!
